Spice Vendor: Hello, sir. Would you be interested in purchasing some spices?
I only sell the finest of spices. I guarantee that they will enrich any meal. Did you know that spices can even enhance the flavor of alcoholic drinks?

I myself have been frequenting the bar every night since last week, and can prove the validity of that fact. I always encourage the support of local businesses. Are you sure you are not interested in my wares?
